Figure.text:
WHAT: General purpose humanoid robot 
CATEGORY: AI robotics 
CAPABILITIES: Performing end-to-end operations safely, learning and adapting to tasks 
FEATURES: Dexterity of the human form, cutting edge AI 
SPECS: Height - 5'6", Payload - 20kg, Weight - 70kg, Runtime - 5hr, Speed - 1.2M/S, System - Electric 
USERS: Commercial customers, households 
MARKETS: Manufacturing, logistics, warehousing, retail 
STAGE: Commercially available 
NOTE: Designed to perform household tasks 100% autonomously

company.text:
NAME: Figure

POSITIONING: Bringing a general purpose humanoid to life, solving labor shortages 
INDUSTRIES: Robotics, AI
